txt.en: 'The flames may bring my gifts to those who oppose me.'
The Foundry
'Time to go down below...'
'To the smelting controls.'
'You stupid oaf,  you must work harder.  The master demands it!'
'Arghhhhhhhhh!'
'I welcome you to the Smelting room. Your bones will add power to the slag below.'
'Materials dropping.'
'The Ring-forge of Orthanc is now vulnerable to harm.'
'Present yourself.'
'So angry!'
Saruman
'Alarm! Time to bring in the brute!'
'The Ring-forge of Orthanc begins to crumble beneath your attacks.'
You must have completed the deed 'Discovery: Instances of Isengard' to play this instance.
'The Ring-forge of Orthanc is showing noticeable damage from your attacks.'
'Your kind words will earn you a little trip.'
'The Ring-forge of Orthanc has been mightly damaged by your attacks.'
'To the controls, you simpletons.'
'The walls, the central furnace, and bellows in this room seem to radiating heat. If someone were to graze against them, it would surely be their demise.'
'The Ring-forge begins to radiate dark energies that cause grievous harm.  Perhaps damaging the forge will dissipate these energies.'
'The dark energies from the Ring-forge of Orthanc are becoming more powerful.'
'The dark energies will cause grave danger to those within the ring-forge room. This energy can only be lessened by significantly damaging the ring-forge.'
'The slag shall protect me.'
'These fools have found their way to our Master's forge.'
'We shall dispatch them so that Saruman's work may continue.'
